statements: DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_name = 'Example Project';
DELETE FROM projects WHERE status = 'Completed' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe' AND (status = 'Inactive' OR end_date < '2022-07-01');
DELETE FROM projects WHERE end_date < CURRENT_DATE();
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM timelines WHERE timeline_date < CURRENT_DATE);
DELETE FROM timelines WHERE project_id = (SELECT project_id FROM projects WHERE project_name = 'Sample Project');
DELETE FROM timelines WHERE project_id = '328cc63e-8f48-4c8c-b5ab-0a7d319ce3cf' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1 AND project_name = 'Example Project';
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 1 AND task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%Example%');
DELETE FROM timelines WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM projects WHERE project_name = 'Example Project');
